bubbles: Welcome aboard, newcomer…
Let’s meet some friends who care about the same things you do. They’ll kickstart your financial adventure!
Do you want us to make a recommendation of who to meet first?
First things first, tell me what you’re most interested in…
No problem, I’ll drop you off on Cove Island
Alriiight! I’ll take you to a harbor to meet some of our friends who share your interests.
Interesting! I’m pretty sure my friends can help you with that…
I also need to know which topic you care most about…
During your trip, search for the stars to find the fintechs that suit you best.
Hey visitor!
Wanna help in a mission?
Ok, come back later when you’ll be ready!
THANKS!
So happy you’re helping
First things first, tell me what you’re most interested in…
Interesting

That’s interesting!
I’m pretty sure my friends can help you with this …
Hello world
Hi there! Did you know Aven can help finance your next big home improvement?
Great! We’re going to renovate some houses on the island with Aven‘s help.
Take this hammer and help us finish the job.
There are several around here that need some fixing!
Hey! Don’t forget about us, let’s apply the finishing touch to these houses.
Great work, thanks! Go ahead and keep the hammer…
there are houses in need of upgrades all over the island.
Do you own your own home? Aven can help you secure a competitive interest rate on your credit card.
Want to find out how?
Aven offers credit cards that uses the equity from your home.
Use it on home improvement projects or other large purchases.
It’s easy, fast, and simple.
No problem! If you change your mind, you know where to find me.
Come check us out!
Ahhh… Much better! Thanks, friend!
Coastal built the banking engine for our friends here at Coastal World!
Just like a high performance car, it takes efficiency, reliability, and trust to get the most out of your money.
Think you have what it takes to beat the clock, champ?
You chickening out, champ? Ok.
Good to see you again. Want to learn more about Aven?
At Aven, we’re on a mission to reduce credit card interest rates by using your home equity.
No problem. Feel free to come back if you change your mind.
Come check us out!
Ready for a lap? Show me you’ve got the horsepower, champ!
No problemo! I’ll stick around here.
You completed one lap… not bad! But it takes more than that to become a legend.
Want to see your name in gold letters at the top of the leaderboard?
Then you’ll have to beat my time by completing the circuit in under {{gameGoals.CircuitCar}} seconds.
Ok, but… I don’t think you could beat me, even with a rocket engine…
Congratulations! Of all the handy workers on the island, you’re the handiest!
Hey sailor! I’m going to sail to Cove Island,
that’s right by Aven and Brigit. Wanna come?
Alright, you can find me anytime here if you change your mind
Wanna go on Cove Island?
Maybe later then? I’ll be right here.
Welcome, fellow reader !
This is a test of my language.
ah, ah… oh, oh… uh, uh… eh, eh…
Do you like our dialog system?
Amazing!
Thanks a lot!
Hey sailor! I’m going to sail to Lake Island,
that’s right by Greenwood and Prosper. Wanna come?
Alright, if you change your mind, you can find me here any time!
Wanna go on Lake Island?
Maybe later then? I’ll be right here.
Hey sailor! I’m going to sail to Wild Island…
…that’s right by Kikoff and Aspiration. Wanna come?
Alright, if you change your mind, you can find me here any time!
Wanna go on Wild Island?
Maybe later then? I’ll be right here.
Hey sailor! I’m going to sail to Lake Island…
…that’s right by Bluevine and ONE. Wanna come?
Alright, if you change your mind, you can find me here any time!
Wanna go on Lake Island?
Maybe later then? I’ll be right here.
Hey sailor! I’m going to sail to Cove Island,
that’s right by Pomelo and Zenda. Wanna come?
Alright, if you change your mind, you can find me here any time!
Wanna go on Cove Island?
Maybe later then? I’ll be right here.
Hey sailor! I’m going to sail to Wild Island,
that’s right by Till and Coastal. Wanna come?
Alright, if you change your mind, you can find me here any time!
Wanna go on Wild Island?
Maybe later then? I’ll be right here.
Thanks for fixing that bridge! I’ve been stuck here for ages…
As a show of thanks, I’ll tell you a secret… There’s treasure on this island…
And I’ll tell you something else… I hear it’s possible to light up every lighthouse throughout the islands.
They say it has something to do with the folks at Kikoff on Wild Island… but I’ll believe it when I see it.
Did you know there are hidden treasures all over this island?
And just because I like you, I’m gonna let you in on where one of those treasures is buried…
Interested?
Hmm?
Well… Alright then!
I saw one hidden on the beach at the top of the village.
Hey there! You look like someone who loves nature. Am I right?
If you want to be a friend to the environment, head over to Wild Island and search for the Aspiration booth.
There’s a gift waiting for you there.
You should go to Wild Island and chat with our friends at Aspiration.
Together, let’s take care of our planet. There’s also a gift waiting for you there!
With all the Coastal Points I collected, I was able to unlock enough equipment to go to the moon!
Check your phone to see what you’ve unlocked!
HELP!!! SHE’S DROWNING!!!
Oh, I was way off! She’s just swimming to Lake Island…
Perhaps she hasn’t heard that there are boats at each island to help you move around quickly.
We should probably tell her!
I love music. And sushi. But music, more so, you know?
If you go to Greenwood on Lake Island, they’ll tell you how to turn on the speakers that you can find all over the archipelago.
Greetings, traveler!
Did you know that each of the three islands on this archipelago has a different activity?
There’s a boat race, a car track, and a mountain bike course. Head to the harbor if you want to sail from one island to another…
Have a good trip!
Got some Coastal Points to spend?
Do what I did: pull out your phone and unlock a rad costume for yourself.
You’ll find Coastal Points in the chests on the beach, right over there!
Thanks for opening the skatepark… It’s awesome!
We can even turn the sound up really loud…
… and find the hidden treasure!
Hi! Coastal built this community for you! Quests, mini games, accessories, wow…
Who is Coastal, you ask?
Coastal provides banking as a service to our partners on this island…so they can help you on your financial journey!
They all have something interesting to offer, check ‘em out now!
See these horns on my head? I found them on my phone. Pretty cool, right?
My phone also has a map of the archipelago, a wallet for all my Coastal Points, and a list of landmarks with all the quests I can complete…
The only thing I can’t do is make a phone call…
There’s an old legend that says it’s easy to become the king of an island, but it’s harder to become emperor of Coastal World!
They say, to become emperor, you need to visit each brand on each island, on the night of a full moon, wearing purple sandals…
Ok, I’m not sure about the full moon or the sandals…
But if you meet ALL the brands, you’ll get a crown! That ought to get people talking at your next party.
Thanks for helping me fund my coffee shop. I’m buzzing!
I’m the happiest person on the island, and it’s all thanks to you and Bluevine!
Hey, did you know there’s treasure hidden around here?
Grrr! I’m a bear.
Had you going for a moment, didn’t I?
This costume is great!
I unlocked it with the Coastal Points I collected on my phone. Yessiree!
Here, we dance even when there’s no music!
… But I’ll admit, it’s a lot more fun when there’s music.
Did you come across any residents who were a little… how should I say… pale blue?
You can make them feel better by going to Zenda‘s on Long Island.
All the best drivers are competing in a car race on Cove Island…
Think you’re up to the challenge?
Hear ye, hear ye!
Explore all the islands and help our friends along the way,
Open stores, grow trees, bring the music, light the lighthouses, and improve the homes on the bay.
Islands of treasures await you, for helping the people you meet,
So what are you waiting for, traveller? Don’t you know you’ve got tasks to complete?
Isn’t it beautiful? I wrote that, you know.
Pssst!
There are secret islands to explore all over. To sail from island to island, you’ll have to go to the ports.
… Guess they’re not so secret anymore.
… Darn it…
MISSING DIALOG
I’m so happy! I’m about to buy the bike of my dreams. Want to know how I did it?
Daily routine! Because managing your finances is just like exercising: results come with regular training!
So… You ready to challenge me?
Ok! Come back when you’ve warmed up!
Traveling and seeing the world is amazing, but to do that, you need to organize your money!
Thanks to ONE pockets, I can organize my finances AND save money…
…to spend on breathtaking vacations!
Speaking of travel, would you be interested in a boat race?
This will be the highlight of your vacation!
Have a think about it and come back to me… You can’t miss this!
Ready for a lap?
Ok, I’ll be here stretching until you change your mind!
Ready for a boat race?
Ok, I’ll wait for you here. I have plenty of time… I’m on vacation, hehehe.
You broke my record? You must be better than I thought!
Are you going to try to beat your own record next?
Hmph! Just when I was starting to believe in you…
You’ve completed one lap of the lake!
Try to beat my time by completing a lap in under {{gameGoals.CircuitBoat}} seconds.
No problem! You know where to find me.
You’ve completed a lap of the track… Well done!
Next time, see if you can beat my time by completing the race in under {{gameGoals.CircuitBike}} seconds.
No problem! You know where to find me.
What!? You broke my record? Enjoy it while you can…
I’m going back to training.
Ok, I’ll be here practicing.
Wow! You beat my time!…
But we’re just getting started – think you can beat your own record?
Make sure you make the most of your time on the island.
Come back and see me whenever you like!
Hey, you’re back! Want to learn more about Aspiration?
Our promise: Do Well. Do Good.
You can spend and save, all while making the world a better place.
Join us today for a green banking alternative!
Copy that! If you change your mind, you know where to find me.
Come check us out!
Are you interested in saving money AND the environment?
At Aspiration, we’re on a mission to save the planet!
Did you know that every time you use your debit card, we plant a tree?
In the fight against global warming, every little bit helps, so come join us!
No problem. I’ll be here waiting if you change your mind.
Come check us out!
Hey, you are back! Ready to hear more about Coastal?
Great! Many moons ago a bank was formed to help community members grow and thrive financially.
They got so good at it, they started offering their expertise to fintech companies…many of them are right here on this island!
Ok! Feel free to come back to me if you change your mind.
Today, you can find a financial partner that best fits your lifestyle…
…all thanks to Coastal Community Bank AND our partners right here on Coastal World!
Hi! Coastal built this community for you! Quests, mini games, accessories, wow…
Who is Coastal, you ask?
Coastal provides banking as a service to our partners on this island…so they can help you on your financial journey!
They all have something interesting to offer, check ‘em out now!
At ONE, we’re transforming the way people manage their money… Want to find out how?
With a single account, you’ll be able to get paid, spend, save, and grow your money.
Pockets can help you organize your finances and save for anything… including your next vacation!
See you next time!
Come check us out!
Greenwood is modern banking for the Culture. Want to know why?
Our mission is to close the wealth gap by helping underserved, overlooked communities and recirculate wealth.
So while we help you save money, we’re also helping the community.
Be sure to come back and say hi!
Come check us out!
Welcome to Bluevine!
Looking for a financial partner to help you grow your business?
At Bluevine we’re on a mission to support businesses as they manage their finances and grow.
If you change your mind, I’m here all day.
Come check us out!
Want to get your finances on track?
Brigit helps Americans build a bright and peaceful financial future every day.
With our transparent, fair and simple tools, we help you build credit, spend wisely, avoid unfair fees, and start saving more.
We don’t just reduce stress — we promote sustainable financial health!
Come back if you need some advice!
Come check us out!
Following your dreams means setting financial goals for every step of the way.
Prosper offers tools to help you do just that, no matter where you are on your journey.
Prosper’s purpose is to encourage financial wellbeing by providing a range of affordable financial solutions.
This includes personal loans, credit cards, and home equity loans and lines of credit.
Together, we can make a difference!
Come check us out!
At Pomelo, we’re on a mission to reinvent your overseas money transfers by offering a fast and more convenient experience.
Do you want to know more?
Pomelo is trying to make the American Dream more attainable for you while providing stability for your family abroad.
No matter how far apart you are, Pomelo connects you to your loved ones.
Ok! If you change your mind, you know where I’ll be.
Come check us out!
With Till, kids can learn how to manage money for real-life situations…
…with concrete insights on earning, budgeting, and spending.
With Till’s free app and debit card, kids can develop money habits that prepare them for the real world.
Any time! I’ll be here all day.
Come check us out!
At Zenda, we created a powerful tool to help manage your Health Savings Account. The cool kids call it an HSA.
Would you like to know more?
Our card is designed for purchases of all kinds and can automatically determine which items in your shopping cart are HSA eligible.
You’ll be surprised how much you can save!
No problem! I’m here all day!
Come check us out!
Nice to see you again. What else do you want to know about Till?
At Till, we’re on a mission to create a generation of smarter spenders by teaching kids how to manage their money.
Budgeting, spending and earning… That’s the way to financial independence!
Any time! Come back whenever you’re ready.
Come check us out!
Did you know that Pomelo is one of the easiest ways to send money overseas?
Send and receive funds instantly and start using it anywhere that Mastercard is accepted.
We’re not just changing how money moves, we’re changing the dynamic in a family relationship.
Of course! Come back if you want to hear more.
Come check us out!
Good to see you again. So, do you want to know more about Bluevine?
At Bluevine we’re on a mission to support businesses with all of their banking needs.
Ok! Feel free to come back to me if you change your mind.
Come check us out!
Do you know that our name comes from the Greenwood District in the early 1900’s?
In Greenwood, recirculation of Black wealth occurred all day, every day, and Black businesses thrived as a result…
We want that back! And we’ll do it by taking back control of our lives and our financial future. This is our time.
Sure! Come back soon and I’ll tell you all about Black Wall Street!
Come check us out!
Hello again! Have you come back to learn more about Brigit?
Brigit is a holistic financial health app that helps you reduce your stress, build your credit, save, and budget for your future.
Got it. If you change your mind, you know where to find me.
Come check us out!
Hello again! Would you like some info on ONE?
ONE simplifies your life. From a single app, you can spend, save and grow your money.
ONE helps you do more with your money.
If you change your mind, you know where to find me!
Come check us out!
Many families using a Health Savings Account miss out on recovering eligible medical expenses each year.
Zenda is here to make sure that doesn’t happen to you!
Our goal is to help you optimize your HSA with an intelligent card that automatically sorts your purchases.
That means you save time and money!
Of course! Any time.
Come check us out!
At Aspiration, we’re committed to the environment, and that’s more than just talk.
Every time you swipe your Aspiration card, we plant a tree.
And guess what? I’m the one in charge of taking care of the trees on the island! Want to help me grow them?
I hereby entrust you with… my watering can. In the right hands, it can work wonders. You’ll see!
Why not try watering this seedling, right here?
All you need to do is water some seedlings.
I’ve planted some around the neighborhood.
Come back and see me when it’s done!
Thanks for your help! Now you can water all the seedlings throughout Coastal World.
Before long, this place will be full of beautiful trees, all because of you!
Hey, friend! That’s a whole forest you’ve planted there… Great job!
I’ve got something IMPORTANT to tell you…
Till helps kids learn about financial independence…
… and independence is pretty IMPORTANT, wouldn’t you agree?
Okay okay okay… But what’s all that got to do with this pair of shears?
Vines are completely covering up the skatepark!
So take these shears and get rid of the vines, then we can reopen the park for the kids!
We’re counting on you!
Go and clear the access to the skatepark. It’s right by here.
Isn’t it amazing what you can do with a pair of shears and a little hard work?
But tell me, did you find the treasure chest hidden on Skatepark Island?
Hey! We need help! There’s someone stuck on the other side of the island!
The whole Pomelo team are experts at building bridges to connect people - from long and far.
Will you come and help us?
Here, take this.
It’s not just a screwdriver, it’s a symbol – a link between families around the globe…
…and financial security for loved ones that are separated.
In a way, this tool is kind of like Pomelo!
But for now, we’ve got a bridge to build… Better get to work!
Head straight to the sea! Do you see an islet over there?
Did you know: an “islet” is a small island? I didn’t know that either!
The bridge is right here, you can’t miss it!
You did it! That’s one small step for man, one giant leap for…
… what am I saying? Thanks for your help!
Hey! A coffee shop just opened in the area, and guess who their financial partner is?
I’ll give you a hint: it starts with BLUE and ends with VINE…
That’s right! BLUEVINE! Bluevine is a great financial partner for small businesses.
and they need YOU to help with their latest client success story.
Grab those scissors and let’s cut the ribbon to open that coffee shop over there.
And remember, ribbon cutting is serious business. So stay sharp, okay?
Hey! You promised you’d help us open the coffee shop…let’s do this thing!
It’s right over the bridge! You’re just a hop and two skips away.
Thanks a lot. Since you helped me, I’ll let you in on a little secret: this part of the island has lots of hidden treasure chests.
Grab a fresh cup for the road and explore the island to find them. Good luck!
Hey there! We’re planning a HUGE party here at Greenwood. You want in?
We’re using the power of music to bring people together…
…and financially support Black and Latino communities.
Here, take this record and help us get started… This is gonna be big!
Haven’t you found the sound system yet? It’s the one with the huge speakers…
… you can’t miss it!
BOOM! Can you feel that??? But your quest isn’t over yet.
There are sound systems on each island. So let’s bring the beat!
There’s great vibes all over the islands… Nice work!
Understanding HSA (Health Savings Accounts) can be a real pain!
Have you noticed some folks on Wild Island not quite feeling…their best?
Luckily, Zenda is here to help us with health and wellness. Here…
I want you to care for the first person you meet who looks likes they need help.
Come back and see me when you’re done!
Go help people with their ailments. You’ll be able to recognize them easily.
They’re the ones who look like they could use some assistance.
Great! Now make sure you help as many people as you can on your travels!
You did it! The people of Coastal World owe you a debt of gratitude…
You don’t do massages too, by any chance?
Help! My brother is stranded on a small island off the shores of Coastal World!
I’d fly there myself, but my wings are too small! … Take the boat you say? But I’m afraid of water!
I know Pomelo is trying to help him… Would you give them a hand?
Well hello there! Are you the type of person who wants to excel and reach new heights?
Then why not go see Prosper on Lake Island? They’re looking for someone with your ambition!
ZING! I’m fast. I’m even faster. But I’m not the fastest. Think you can beat the record at Brigit?
You should stretch out a bit, then go see Brigit to see who’s fastest!
You look like someone who wants to open a business on the archipelago!
Go see Bluevine, they could use your help opening a new coffee shop! It’s on Lake Island.
By the power of earthly regeneration … Go plant some trees with Aspiration on Wild Island!
What a party! We should head to the skatepark once it’s over. It’s on Cove Island.
You’ll meet Till there. They’re super cool!
There’s a feeling in the air…am I right?
Let’s turn on all the sound systems on Lake Island.
Ask Greenwood for help, they know all about spreading good vibes and bringing people together!
There’s nothing like fitness and exercise to prevent aches and pains.
Don’t believe me? Go ask Zenda on Wild Island!
You look pretty strong! Want to give us a hand?
Go see Aven for me, on Cove Island. They’ve got something to show you.
Hey there! You’re invited to the grand opening of a coffee shop on Lake Island.
Go visit the fine folks at Bluevine, they’ll give you all the details.
Hello friends from Kikk festival!
This is a demonstration of spoken expression. Let’s try it.
ah, ah…
oh, oh…
uh, uh…
eh, eh…
Amazing! Thanks a lot!
I’m looking forward to having a beer tonight and discussing inspiring topics about digital!
Do you like our dialog system?
Cheers!
I’m so afraid of what you’re going to answer…
How are you doing?
It’s cool right?
WIIIIIIIIILSOOOOON !
WIIIIIIIIILSOOOOON !
I lost my friend, hope he’s fine…
Hey, I’m Laura from Coastal Community Bank, nice to meet you!
I hear there was a party there…
so I swam straight from our headquarter in Everett!
Hope I’m not late. Did I miss something?!
Hello again! Back to learn more about Prosper?
Ok, see you later!
Whether you’re looking for debt consolidation, home improvement…
…or even healthcare financing, you’ve come to the right place!
We have solutions to help you fund your dreams and projects.
This is #HowYouProsper!
Come check us out!
Hey there! Are you ready to reach new heights?
You know, at Prosper, we believe our smart, simple tools help people find their financial footing.
Managing your finances can be as challenging - and rewarding - as climbing!
Together, let’s raise a flag to celebrate the spirit of financial wellbeing!
There are 4 flag poles scattered around Coastal World.
Now, it’s up to you!
Oh really? Hmmm ok…
If you change your mind, come back to see me.
I’ll have a mission for you!
Here, take this flag and get ready to climb.
If you find some motivation, come back to see me, I’ll have a mission for you!
You can’t reach the top? Come on, I’ll help you…
The first flag pole is right behind you, at the top of the steps!
Great job!
Now find the 3 highest points on the archipelago, and prove what you are capable of!
You planted all the flags, nothing can stop you!
Next step…Everest?
At Kikoff, our mission is to provide refreshingly fair, effective, and simple pathways to meet your financial goals.
Would you like to know more about us?
Kikoff is a personal finance platform that offers affordable credit-building solutions.
See you next time!
Come check us out!
Hello again! Ready to build your credit with Kikoff?
Ok! Come and see me when you’re back in the area.
It’s fast and simple - download the app and get started.
Start to improve your credit score and achieve financial independence.
Come check us out!
Hey there, do you see the lighthouse at the end of the road?
Its purpose is to guide the ships and make sure they stay on the right track.
Well, it’s the same for Kikoff!
The Kikoff app allows you to follow the evolution of your credit score - in real time!
So, you can achieve your financial goals and keep them right on track.
Here, take this lightbulb
Having a clear vision is a great first step toward learning how to manage your finances.
So now it’s up to you, go turn on the lighthouses of the archipelago!
Head to the highest building on the island…
Look up, you’re sure to see it!
You’ve turned on the lighthouse! It’s wonderful!
There are other lighthouses waiting for your spark to light them up.
You know what you have to do!
What!? You’ve lit up all the lighthouses on the archipelago? That makes me so happy!
Welcome back !
It’s such a nice weather, isn’t it?
